passives.name: Bring It Down
passives.effects: Basic attacks on-hit grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal {{rd|150 to 200 for 11|150*0.8 to 200*0.8 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} bonus physical damage physical damage on-hit, increased by +0 to 100% target's missing health, for up to {{rd|150*1.5 to 200*1.5 for 11|150*0.8*1.5 to 200*0.8*1.5 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} bonus physical damage physical damage.
